text: Henry Joseph Kalis (March 2, 1937 – September 12, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Easton, Minnesota. He was a member of the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1975 to 2003. He was a member of the Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party. Kalis died on September 12, 2018, in Albert Lea, Minnesota from emphysema, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== *Kalis Reminisces: "Fun While It Lasted" (p. 17) Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from emphysema Category:Cancer deaths in Minnesota Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Henry Kalis
